name: Heart and Soul Web Design
tagline: We Build Your Website with Heart and Soul
description:
Heart and Soul Web Design is owned by Jack Paddock.
Jack started in the web design business in 2009 under the name of Jumpin’ Jack Flash Web Design.
Jumpin’ Jack’s early days focused on Flash websites, which were visually stimulating and engaging to the viewer.
In 2010 Jack began building WordPress websites as he wanted to be able to offer his clients the features that are so important to the growth of their businesses.
